sentences.sentence: The piece segues into his solo with the strings.

sentences.sentence: Everyone in my family is well educated, which is why simple dinner chit-chat usually segues into an exuberant discussion chock full of sarcasm, wit and the occasional clash of opinions.
sentences.translation: 我家中的每个人都受过良好的教育，所以在我们家，单纯的晚餐闲聊常常演变成充满讽刺、机智与偶尔的意见冲突的热烈讨论。
